sqlMap.sql: m.t0_CUID, m.t0_LABEL_CN, m.t0_AUFNR, m.t0_ORDER_STATE, m.t0_publish_num, t0_0_1.t1_LABEL_CN as t0_0_1_t1_LABEL_CN, 'FW_EMPLOYEE' as t0_0_1_BD, m.t0_SUBMIT_USER, m.t0_SUBMIT_DATE, m.t0_MANDT, m.t0_PXDAT, m.t0_PLANT, m.t0_MIPOS, m.t0_PCDAT, m.t0_ARBPL, m.t0_MATNR, m.t0_KDAUF, m.t0_KDPOS, m.t0_KDTXT, m.t0_ZCKPP, m.t0_MAKTX2, m.t0_MAKTX1, m.t0_ZZCKS, m.t0_ATWRT2, m.t0_PSMNG, m.t0_PMENGE, m.t0_ZTXT02, m.t0_ZDBLC, m.t0_BRGEW2, m.t0_CRDAT, m.t0_CPUTM, t0_1_2.t1_LABEL_CN as t0_1_2_t1_LABEL_CN, 'FW_EMPLOYEE' as t0_1_2_BD, m.t0_CRNAM, m.t0_MRNAM, m.t0_ZMUZE, t0_2_3.t1_LABEL_CN as t0_2_3_t1_LABEL_CN, 'FW_EMPLOYEE' as t0_2_3_BD, m.t0_MNAME, m.t0_FBDAT, m.t0_FBUZE, t0_3_4.t1_LABEL_CN as t0_3_4_t1_LABEL_CN, 'FW_EMPLOYEE' as t0_3_4_BD, m.t0_FNAME, t0_PFLAG, to_Org_lableCN, t0_psbh, t0_freeze, t0_ARBPL1

m.t0_CUID, m.t0_LABEL_CN, m.t0_AUFNR, m.t0_ORDER_STATE, m.t0_publish_num, m.t0_SUBMIT_USER, m.t0_SUBMIT_DATE, m.t0_MANDT, m.t0_PXDAT, m.t0_PLANT, m.t0_MIPOS, m.t0_PCDAT, m.t0_ARBPL, m.t0_MATNR, m.t0_KDAUF, m.t0_KDPOS, m.t0_KDTXT, m.t0_ZCKPP, m.t0_MAKTX2, m.t0_MAKTX1, m.t0_ZZCKS, m.t0_ATWRT2, m.t0_PSMNG, m.t0_PMENGE, m.t0_ZTXT02, m.t0_ZDBLC, m.t0_BRGEW2, m.t0_CRDAT, m.t0_CPUTM, m.t0_CRNAM, m.t0_MRNAM, m.t0_ZMUZE, m.t0_MNAME, m.t0_FBDAT, m.t0_FBUZE, m.t0_FNAME, t0_PFLAG, to_Org_lableCN, t0_psbh, t0_freeze, t0_ARBPL1, t0_taskid, t0_poskey

dynamic.isNotEmpty: (m.t0_PXDAT >= to_date(#pxdat_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') or m.t0_PXDAT is null)
(m.t0_PXDAT <= to_date(#pxdat_end#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') or m.t0_PXDAT is null)

sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ZG_T_ORDER ( CUID , LABEL_CN , AUFNR , ORDER_STATE , SUBMIT_USER , SUBMIT_DATE , MANDT , PXDAT , PLANT , MIPOS , PCDAT , ARBPL , MATNR , KDAUF , KDPOS , KDTXT , ZCKPP , MAKTX2 , MAKTX1 , ZZCKS , ATWRT2 , PSMNG , PMENGE , ZTXT02 , ZDBLC , BRGEW2 , CRDAT , CPUTM , CRNAM , MRNAM , ZMUZE , MNAME , FBDAT , FBUZE , FNAME , PFLAG , psbh, freeZe ) VALUES ( #cuid# , #labelCn# , #aufnr# , #orderState# , #submitUser# , #submitDate# , #mandt# , #pxdat# , #plant# , #mipos# , #pcdat# , #arbpl# , #matnr# , #kdauf# , #kdpos# , #kdtxt# , #zckpp# , #maktx2# , #maktx1# , #zzcks# , #atwrt2# , #psmng# , #pmenge# , #ztxt02# , #zdblc# , #brgew2# , #crdat# , #cputm# , #crnam# , #mrnam# , #zmuze# , #mname# , #fbdat# , #fbuze# , #fname# , #pflag# , #psbh#, #freeZe# )
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZG_T_ORDER SET LABEL_CN = #labelCn# , AUFNR = #aufnr# , ORDER_STATE = #orderState# , SUBMIT_USER = #submitUser# , SUBMIT_DATE = #submitDate# , MANDT = #mandt# , PXDAT = #pxdat# , PLANT = #plant# , MIPOS = #mipos# , PCDAT = #pcdat# , ARBPL = #arbpl# , MATNR = #matnr# , KDAUF = #kdauf# , KDPOS = #kdpos# , KDTXT = #kdtxt# , ZCKPP = #zckpp# , MAKTX2 = #maktx2# , MAKTX1 = #maktx1# , ZZCKS = #zzcks# , ATWRT2 = #atwrt2# , PSMNG = #psmng# , PMENGE = #pmenge# , ZTXT02 = #ztxt02# , ZDBLC = #zdblc# , BRGEW2 = #brgew2# , CRDAT = #crdat# , CPUTM = #cputm# , CRNAM = #crnam# , MRNAM = #mrnam# , ZMUZE = #zmuze# , MNAME = #mname# , FBDAT = #fbdat# , FBUZE = #fbuze# , FNAME = #fname# , PFLAG = #pflag# , psbh = #psbh#, freeZe = #freeZe# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
sqlMap.select:
select
from (select t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, t0.publish_num as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, t0.PXDAT as t0_PXDAT, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(task.PLANT) t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, t0.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, null as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1 from ZG_T_ORDER t0,zg_t_order_task task
where t0.cuid=task.order_id group by
t0.CUID , t0.LABEL_CN , t0.AUFNR , t0.ORDER_STATE , t0.publish_num , t0.SUBMIT_USER , t0.SUBMIT_DATE , t0.MANDT, t0.PXDAT , t0.PLANT , t0.MIPOS , t0.PCDAT, t0.ARBPL , t0.MATNR, t0.kdauf, t0.KDPOS, t0.KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP , t0.MAKTX2 , t0.MAKTX1 , t0.ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG , t0.PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 , t0.ZDBLC , t0.BRGEW2 , t0.CRDAT , t0.CPUTM , t0.CRNAM , t0.MRNAM , t0.ZMUZE , t0.MNAME , t0.FBDAT, t0.FBUZE , t0.FNAME , t0.PFLAG, t0.ARBPL1 ,
t0.psbh , t0.freeze ) m left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_0_1 on t0_0_1.t0_CUID = m.t0_SUBMIT_USER left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_3_4 on t0_3_4.t0_CUID = m.t0_FNAME where m.t0_CUID =#cuid#

select
from (select task.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, t0.publish_num as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, task.px_date as t0_PXDAT, task.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, task.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, task.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, null as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1 from ZG_T_ORDER t0,zg_t_order_task task where t0.cuid=task.order_id ) m left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_0_1 on t0_0_1.t0_CUID = m.t0_SUBMIT_USER left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_3_4 on t0_3_4.t0_CUID = m.t0_FNAME where m.t0_CUID =#cuid#

select
from ( select t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, t0.publish_num as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, t0.PXDAT as t0_PXDAT, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, t0.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, null as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1 from ZG_T_ORDER t0 ) m left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_0_1 on t0_0_1.t0_CUID = m.t0_SUBMIT_USER left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_3_4 on t0_3_4.t0_CUID = m.t0_FNAME
$sortColumns$

select count(*) from ( select
from ( select t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, t0.publish_num as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, t0.PXDAT as t0_PXDAT, t0.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, t0.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, null as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1 from ZG_T_ORDER t0 ,fw_organization fw
,FW_ORGANIZATION_MANAGER fom
where t0.arbpl=fw.cuid(+)
and fom.org_id(+) = t0.ARBPL and fom.EMPLOYEE_ID=#operatorId#
) m left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_0_1 on t0_0_1.t0_CUID = m.t0_SUBMIT_USER left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_3_4 on t0_3_4.t0_CUID = m.t0_FNAME
)

select
from ( select t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, nvl(t0.publish_num,0) as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, t0.PXDAT as t0_PXDAT, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(task.PLANT) t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, t0.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, t0.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1, fw.label_cn as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze from ZG_T_ORDER t0,fw_organization fw,zg_t_order_task task
,FW_ORGANIZATION_MANAGER fom
where t0.arbpl=fw.cuid(+) and t0.order_state<>'-1'
and fom.org_id(+) = t0.ARBPL and fom.EMPLOYEE_ID=#operatorId#
and t0.cuid=task.order_id group by
t0.CUID , t0.LABEL_CN , t0.AUFNR , t0.ORDER_STATE , t0.publish_num , t0.SUBMIT_USER , t0.SUBMIT_DATE , t0.MANDT, t0.PXDAT , t0.PLANT , t0.MIPOS , t0.PCDAT, t0.ARBPL , t0.MATNR, t0.kdauf, t0.KDPOS, t0.KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP , t0.MAKTX2 , t0.MAKTX1 , t0.ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG , t0.PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 , t0.ZDBLC , t0.BRGEW2 , t0.CRDAT , t0.CPUTM , t0.CRNAM , t0.MRNAM , t0.ZMUZE , t0.MNAME , t0.FBDAT, t0.FBUZE , t0.FNAME , t0.PFLAG, t0.ARBPL1 , fw.label_cn, t0.psbh , t0.freeze ) m left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_0_1 on t0_0_1.t0_CUID = m.t0_SUBMIT_USER left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_3_4 on t0_3_4.t0_CUID = m.t0_FNAME
$sortColumns$

t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_1_2 on t0_1_2.t0_CUID = m.t0_CRNAM left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,
t0.SEX as t0_SEX, t0.MOBILE as t0_MOBILE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.EMAIL as t0_EMAIL from FW_OPERATOR t1, FW_EMPLOYEE t0 where t1.CUID = t0.CUID ) t0_2_3 on t0_2_3.t0_CUID = m.t0_MNAME left join ( select t1.CUID as t1_CUID, t1.LABEL_CN as t1_LABEL_CN, t1.USER_ID as t1_USER_ID, t1.PASSWORD as t1_PASSWORD, t1.CREATE_TIME as t1_CREATE_TIME, t1.LAST_MODIFY_TIME as t1_LAST_MODIFY_TIME, t1.EFFECT_TIME as t1_EFFECT_TIME, t1.STATUS as t1_STATUS, t1.RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID as t1_RELATED_BM_CLASS_ID, t0.CUID as t0_CUID,

select
from (select t0.CUID as t0_CUID, t0.LABEL_CN as t0_LABEL_CN, t0.AUFNR as t0_AUFNR, t0.ORDER_STATE as t0_ORDER_STATE, t0.publish_num as t0_publish_num, t0.SUBMIT_USER as t0_SUBMIT_USER, t0.SUBMIT_DATE as t0_SUBMIT_DATE, t0.MANDT as t0_MANDT, task.PX_DATE as t0_PXDAT, task.PLANT as t0_PLANT, t0.MIPOS as t0_MIPOS, t0.PCDAT as t0_PCDAT, task.ARBPL as t0_ARBPL, t0.MATNR as t0_MATNR, t0.KDAUF as t0_KDAUF, t0.KDPOS as t0_KDPOS, t0.KDTXT as t0_KDTXT, t0.ZCKPP as t0_ZCKPP, t0.MAKTX2 as t0_MAKTX2, t0.MAKTX1 as t0_MAKTX1, t0.ZZCKS as t0_ZZCKS, t0.ATWRT2 as t0_ATWRT2, t0.PSMNG as t0_PSMNG, t0.PMENGE as t0_PMENGE, t0.ZTXT02 as t0_ZTXT02, t0.ZDBLC as t0_ZDBLC, t0.BRGEW2 as t0_BRGEW2, t0.CRDAT as t0_CRDAT, t0.CPUTM as t0_CPUTM, t0.CRNAM as t0_CRNAM, t0.MRNAM as t0_MRNAM, t0.ZMUZE as t0_ZMUZE, t0.MNAME as t0_MNAME, t0.FBDAT as t0_FBDAT, t0.FBUZE as t0_FBUZE, t0.FNAME as t0_FNAME, t0.PFLAG as t0_PFLAG, null as to_Org_lableCN, t0.psbh as t0_psbh, t0.freeze as t0_freeze, t0.ARBPL1 as t0_ARBPL1, task.cuid as t0_taskid, task.poskey as t0_poskey from ZG_T_ORDER t0,zg_t_order_task task where t0.cuid=task.order_id and t0.aufnr='$aufnr$' and task.plant='$plant$' and task.flag<>'-1' ) m
